anya-e0801n:1366_0: Tāetāimāto sassa ssāyo hoti vā. Tassāya tāya, etissāya etāya, imissāya imāya.
anya-e0801n:1368_0: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo hoti vā, ratto rattiyaṃ, ādo ādismiṃ.
anya-e0801n:1372_0: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ ca ā hoti simhi. Kattā, pitā. Pitu, mātu, bhāvu, mītu, duhitu, jāmātu, nattu, hotu, potu.
anya-e0801n:1374_0: Ltupitādīnaṃ a hoti ge ā ca, bho katta, bho kattā, bho pita, bho pitā.
anya-e0801n:1376_0: A i u iccesaṃ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge.
anya-e0801n:1376_2: bho purisa, bho aggī, bho aggi,
anya-e0801n:1378_0: Ghato brahmādito ca gasse vā hoti.
anya-e0801n:1378_6: bho khatta, bho ise, bho isi,
anya-e0801n:1380_0: Ammādīhi gasse na hoti. Bhoti ammā, bhoti annā, bhoti ambā.
anya-e0801n:1382_0: Ammādīnaṃ ge rasso hoti vā. Bhoti amma, bhoti ammā.
anya-e0801n:1384_0: Ssamādīsu gho rasso hoti. Tassaṃ, tassā, tassāya, taṃ, sabhatiṃ, esviti kiṃ? Tāya, sabhāya.
anya-e0801n:1386_0: Ekavacane yosu ca ghaokārantavajjitā naṃ nāmānaṃ rasso hoti tiliṅge. Itthiṃ, itthiyā, itthiyo,
anya-e0801n:1386_1: vadhuṃ vadhuyā, vadhuyo, daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍinā, daṇḍino,
anya-e0801n:1388_0: Aghonaṃ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge, itthi, itthī, vadhu, vadhū, daṇḍi, daṇḍī, sayambhu, sayambhū.
anya-e0801n:1390_0: Napuṃsakavajjitassa nāmassa sismiṃ rasso na hoti. Itthī, daṇḍī, vadhū, sayambhū.
anya-e0801n:1392_0: Gasihinaṃvajjitāsu vibhattīsu gosaddassa gāvagavā honti. (Gāvaṃ, gavaṃ), gāvo, gavo, gāvena, gavena, gāvassa, gavassa, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāve, gave.
anya-e0801n:1394_0: Gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā. Gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e0801n:1396_0: Gossa se vā gavaṃ hoti saha sena. Gavaṃ, gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e0801n:1398_0: Naṃvacanena saha gossa gunnaṃ hoti gavaṃca vā. Gunnaṃ, gavaṃ, gonaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1400_0: Goto nāssa ā hoti vā. Gāvā, gavā, gāvena, gavena.
anya-e0801n:1402_0: Aṃvacane gossa gāvha vā hoti. Vāvhaṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ. Gossa goṇādeso na kato… saddantarattā.
anya-e0801n:1404_0: Pasaññīto aṃvacanassa yaṃ vā hoti. Itthiyaṃ, itthiṃ. Pītoti kiṃ? Daṇḍiṃ, rattiṃ.
anya-e0801n:1406_0: Jhasaññīto aṃvacanassa naṃ vā hoti. Daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍiṃ.
anya-e0801n:1406_3: Jhāti kiṃ? Itthiṃ. Īti kiṃ? Aggiṃ.
anya-e0801n:1408_0: Jhīto yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge. Daṇḍīno, daṇḍine, daṇḍī,
anya-e0801n:1410_0: Jhīto yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge. Daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti, daṇḍino passa, daṇḍī vā.
anya-e0801n:1412_0: Jhīto smiṃvacanassa ni hoti vā, daṇḍini, daṇḍismiṃ, jhīto tveva? Aggismiṃ.
anya-e0801n:1414_2: pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ, vātveva? Ambumhi, paṃsumhi.
anya-e0801n:1416_2: bhasma (asma), brahma, atta, ātuma, ghamma, muddha.
anya-e0801n:1418_0: Kammādito nāvacanassa eno vā hoti. Kammena, kammanā, cammena, cammanā, kammāditotveva? Buddhena.
anya-e0801n:1421_1: (3) “Ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho”ti brahmādīsu pāṭhā sassa e ṭānubandho.
anya-e0801n:1425_0: Lato yonaṃ vo hoti vā pulliṅge. Bhikkhavo bhikkhū, sayambhuvo sayambhūpumeti kiṃ? Āyūni.
anya-e0801n:1427_0: Jantvādito yonaṃ no hoti vo ca vā pulliṅge. Jantuno,
anya-e0801n:1429_0: Kūpaccayantato yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge, viduno vidū, viññuno viññū, sabbaññuno sabbaññū.
anya-e0801n:1431_0: Amusaddato yonaṃ lopova hoti pulliṅge, amū, pumetveva? Amuyo amūni. Vopavādoyaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1433_0: Amusmā sassa no na hoti, amussa, noti kiṃ? Amuyā.
anya-e0801n:1435_0: Yonaṃ lope nisu ca dīgho hoti, aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, yolopanisūti kiṃ? Rattiyo.
anya-e0801n:1437_0: Esu nāmassa dīgho hoti. Aggīsu, aggīnaṃ, aggīhi.
anya-e0801n:1443_0: Aṃsesu ntappaccayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ca.
anya-e0801n:1443_1: Yaṃ yaṃ hi rāja bhajati santaṃvāyadi vā asaṃ, kiccā-
anya-e0801n:1445_0: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge.
anya-e0801n:1449_0: Yomhi kvaci lasaññassa ussa vā ṭa hoti. Hetayo,
anya-e0801n:1449_2: ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayatu. Vāti kiṃ? Hetuyo.
anya-e0801n:1451_0: Lasaññato uto yossālapane vevo honti vā pulliṅge.
anya-e0801n:1453_0: Nāmasmā paresaṃ smāhisminnaṃ mhā bhimhi vā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1457_0: Akārantānaṃ sabbādīnaṃ e hoti naṃmhi suhisu ca. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesu, sabbehi,
anya-e0801n:1457_4: Sabba katara katama ubhaya itara añña aññatara aññatama (4) “pubbaparā-
anya-e0801n:1457_6: dharāni vavatthāyamasaññāyaṃ” (pā,1,1,34) ya tya ta eta ima amu kiṃ eka tumha amha.
anya-e0801n:1459_0: Sabbādito naṃvacanassa saṃsānaṃ honti. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1461_0: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato sassa ssā vā hoti, sabbassā sabbāya, paggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1463_0: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato smino ssaṃ vā hoti, sabbassaṃ sabbāya, amussaṃ amuyā.
anya-e0801n:1467_0: Sabhāparisāhi smino tiṃ vā hoti, sabhatiṃ sabhāya, parisatiṃ parisāya.
anya-e0801n:1469_0: Ehi smino si hoti vā, padasi padasmiṃ, bilasi bilasmiṃ.
anya-e0801n:1471_0: Padādīhi nāssa sā hoti vā, padasā padena, bilasā bilena.
anya-e0801n:1473_0: Ehi nāssa sā hoti vā, kodhasā kodhena, atthasā atthena.
anya-e0801n:1475_0: Akārantato parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti, buddhena, atoti kiṃ? Agginā.
anya-e0801n:1477_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa o hoti, buddho, atotveva? Aggi.
anya-e0801n:1479_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa e hoti vā kvaci,
anya-e0801n:1481_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa aṃ hoti napuṃsakaliṅge. Rūpaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1483_0: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ ni hoti napuṃsake.
anya-e0801n:1485_0: Jhalato yonaṃ ni hoti vā napuṃsake, aṭṭhīni aṭṭhī, āyūni āyū.
anya-e0801n:1487_0: Jhalato yonaṃ lopo hoti, aṭṭhī, āyū, aggī, bhikkhū,
anya-e0801n:1489_0: Jantuhetūhi īkārantehi ghapa saññehi ca paresaṃ yonaṃ vā lopo hoti,
anya-e0801n:1491_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti vā yakāre,
anya-e0801n:1493_0: Nāmasmā gasīnaṃ lopo hoti vijjhantarābhāve, bho purisa, ayaṃ, daṇḍī.
anya-e0801n:1495_0: Avijjamānasaṅkhyehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti,
anya-e0801n:1497_0: Ekatthībhāve sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti bahulaṃ,
anya-e0801n:1499_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti. Adhitthi.
anya-e0801n:1500_0: Vidhānā yathāpatthīyā, yathāparisāya, pubbasmāti kiṃ? Gāmagato.
anya-e0801n:1502_1: tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti, antu,
anya-e0801n:1504_1: tato parāsaṃ tatiyāsatthamīnaṃ vā aṃ hoti,
anya-e0801n:1506_0: Nāmhi rājassi vā hoti, sabbadattena rājinā, vātveva? Raññā.
anya-e0801n:1508_0: Rājassa ū hoti vā sunaṃhisu, rājūsu rājesu, rājūnaṃ raññaṃ, rājūhi rājehi.
anya-e0801n:1512_0: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ nāmhi anaimiiccādesā honti, anena imīnā, anitthiyaṃtveva? Imāya.
anya-e0801n:1514_0: Imasaddassānapuṃsakassa ayaṃ hoti simhi, ayaṃ puriso, ayaṃ itthī, anapuṃsakassāti kiṃ? Imaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1516_2: syā itthī, evaṃ so, sā, eso, esā,
anya-e0801n:1518_0: Anapuṃsakassāmussa makārassa so hoti simhi, asu puriso, asu itthī.
anya-e0801n:1520_0: Amussa massa ke vā so hoti, asuko amuko, asukā amukā, asukaṃ amukaṃ, asukāni amukāni.
anya-e0801n:1522_0: Tasaddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, ne te nāyo tāyo, naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni iccādi.
anya-e0801n:1524_0: Sādīsvimassa tatassa ca ṭo vā hoti,
anya-e0801n:1526_0: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti, ‘yo nvajja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise’, vātveva? Isi.
anya-e0801n:1528_0: Isismā parassa dutiyāyossa ṭe vā hoti,
anya-e0801n:1532_0: Ekaccādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, ekaccāni.
anya-e0801n:1534_0: Sabbādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, sabbāni.
anya-e0801n:1536_0: Akārantehi sabbādīhi yonameṭa hoti, sabbe tiṭṭhanti, sabbe passa, atotveva? Sabbāyo.
anya-e0801n:1538_0: Nāmabhūtehī appadhānehi ca sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0801n:1544_0: Etthasamāsavisadhaya sabbādīhi yadhassaṭa vutto, tassa vā hoti, pugguttare, pubbuttarā.
anya-e0801n:1546_0: Etehi pubbādīhi chahi savisaye eṭa vā hoti,
anya-e0801n:1548_0: Manādīhi smimādīnaṃ sisoosāsā vā honti yathākkamaṃ,
anya-e0801n:1548_11: Manatama tapa teja sira ura vaca oja rajayasa paya (6) “saravayā-
anya-e0801n:1552_5: bho iti āmantaṇe nipāto ‘kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā’,
anya-e0801n:1554_0: Aggismā sissa ni yoti vā, aggini aggi.
anya-e0801n:1556_0: Simhi ntappaccayassa aṃ hoti vā, gacchaṃ gacchanto.
anya-e0801n:1558_0: Bhūdhātuto ntassa aṃ hoti simhi niccaṃ punabbidhānā, bhavaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1560_0: Simhi mahantārahantānaṃ ntassa ṭā vā hoti, mahā mahaṃ, arahā arahaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1566_0: Himavato simhī ntussa o vā hoti, himavanto himavā.
anya-e0801n:1568_0: Rājādīhiyuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti, rājā, yuvā.
anya-e0801n:1568_1: Rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma (7) “dhammo vāññatthe” daḷhadhammā, asma,
anya-e0801n:1568_4: yuva sā suvā maghava puma vattaha.
anya-e0801n:1570_0: Rājādīnaṃ yuvādīnaṃ ca ānaṅa hoti vā aṃmhi, rājānaṃ rājaṃ, yuvānaṃ yuvaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1572_0: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yonaṃ āno vā hoti, rājāno yuvāno, vā tveva? Rājā rāje, yuvā yuve.
anya-e0801n:1574_0: Sakhato yona māyo no honti vā āno ca, sakhāyo, sakhino, sakhāno, vā tveva? Sakhā, sakhe.
anya-e0801n:1576_0: Sakhato smino ṭe hoti, sakhe, niccattho-yamārambho.
anya-e0801n:1578_0: Sakhassa i hoti nonāsesu, sakhino, sakhinā, sakhissa.
anya-e0801n:1580_0: Sakhassa i vā hoti smānaṃsu, sakhismā sakhasmā, sakhīnaṃ sakhānaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1582_0: Sakhassa āraṅa vā hoti yosvaṃhisu smānaṃsu ca,
anya-e0801n:1584_0: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ ca āraṅa hotī sato- ññatra, kattāro, pitaro, kattāraṃ, pitaraṃ, kattārā, pitarā, kattari, pitari,
anya-e0801n:1586_0: Namhi ltupitādīnumānaṅa vā hoti, kattārānaṃ kattūnaṃ, ditarānaṃ pitunnaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1588_0: Namhi ltupitādīnamā vā hotī, kattānaṃ kattūnaṃ, pītānaṃ pitunnaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1590_0: Ltupitādihi sassa lopo vā hoti, katthu katthuno, sakamantātu sakamandhātuno, pītu pituno.
anya-e0801n:1594_0: Yosu nadisaddassa āma vā hoti, najjāyo nadiyo.
anya-e0801n:1596_0: Katimhā dhayānaṃ ṭi hoti, kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passa.
anya-e0801n:1598_0: Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṃkhyāhi yonaṃ ṭo hoti pañca, pañca,
anya-e0801n:1600_0: Ubhagohi yonaṃ ṭo hoti, ubho, ubho, gāvo, gāvo,
anya-e0801n:1602_0: Āravādesato yonaṃ ṭo hoti, sakhāro, kattāro, pitaro.
anya-e0801n:1604_0: Āravādesamhā yonaṃ ṭoṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ, sakhāro, sakhāre sakhāyo, ṭoggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1606_0: Āravādesamhā nāsmānaṃ ṭā hoti, kattārā, kattarā. Kūci vā hoti bayulādhikārā, etādisā sakhāramhā.
anya-e0801n:1608_0: Āravādesamhā smino ṭi hoti, kattari, vitari.
anya-e0801n:1610_0: Divādīhi nāmehi smino ṭi hoti, divi, bhuvi. Niccaṃ vakārāgamo.
anya-e0801n:1612_0: Smimhi āro rasso hoti, kattari, nattari.
anya-e0801n:1614_0: Natvādivajjitānaṃ pitādīnamāro rasso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, pitaro, pitaraṃ,
anya-e0801n:1616_0: Suhisu yuvādīnaṃ ānaṅa hoti, yuvānesu, yuvānehi.
anya-e0801n:1618_0: Esu yuvādīnamā hoti, yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e0801n:1620_0: Yuvādīhi smāsminnaṃ nāne honti yathākkamaṃ, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e0801n:1622_0: Yuvādīhi yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ, yuvāno, yuvāne, vāti kiṃ?
anya-e0801n:1624_0: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge,
anya-e0801n:1626_0: Aññapadatthe vatthamānā ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne hoti vā kvaci pulliṅge,
anya-e0801n:1628_0: Pumasaddato smino yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vā hoti, pumāne pume.
anya-e0801n:1630_0: Pumassa nāmhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vā hoti, pumānā pumena.
anya-e0801n:1632_0: Pumassa sumhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ ā ca vā hoti, pumānesu, pumāsu pumesuṃ.
anya-e0801n:1634_0: Pumasaddato gassa aṃ vā hoti, bho pumaṃ bho puma, bho ittipumaṃ bho itthipuma.
anya-e0801n:1636_0: Sāsaddassa ānaṅa hoti aṃse ge ca, sānaṃ, sānassa, cabhā sāna.
anya-e0801n:1638_0: Vattahā sanaṃnaṃ nonānaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, vattahāno, vattahānānaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1640_0: Brahmassa u vā hoti sanaṃsu, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmūnaṃ brahmānaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1644_0: Pumādinamu hoti vā sasmāsu nāmhi ca,
anya-e0801n:1646_0: Yuvā sassa vā ino hoti, yuvino yuvassa.
anya-e0801n:1648_0: Attātumehi sassa no hoti vā, attano attassa, ātumano ātumassa.
anya-e0801n:1652_0: Brahmā attaātumehi ca svāssa nā hoti, brahmunā, attanā, ātumanā.
anya-e0801n:1656_0: Sabbāsu vibhattisu kissa ko hoti, ko, eka, kā, kāyo, kaṃ, kāni, keneccāmi.
anya-e0801n:1658_0: Anitthiyaṃ kissa ki vā hoti sasmiṃsu, kissa kassa, kismiṃ kasmiṃ, anitthiyanti kiṃ? Kassā, kassaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1660_0: Aṃsisu saha tehi kiṃsaddassa kiṃ hoti napuṃsake. Kiṃ, kiṃ, napuṃsaketi kiṃ? Ko, kaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1662_0: Aṃsisu saha teti imassa idaṃ hoti vā napuṃsake, idaṃ imaṃ, idaṃ imaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1664_0: Aṃsisu saha tehi amussa aduṃ hoti vā napuṃsake, aduṃ amuṃ, aduṃ amuṃ.
anya-e0801n:1666_0: Amhassa asmā hoti vā sumhi, bhattirasmāsu yā tava, vā tveva? Amhesu.
anya-e0801n:1668_0: Naṃmhi ticatunnaṃ tissacatassā honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ,
anya-e0801n:1670_0: Vibhattisahitānaṃ ticatunnaṃ yomhi tisso catasso honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ, tisso catasso.
anya-e0801n:1672_0: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tīṇicattāri honti napuṃsake, tīṇi. Cattāri.
anya-e0801n:1674_0: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ tayocattāro honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, tayo, cattāro.
anya-e0801n:1676_0: Catusaddassa savibhattissa yomhi caturo vā hoti pulliṅge,
anya-e0801n:1678_0: Yosvamhassa savibhattissa mayamasmā vā honti yathākkamaṃ, mayaṃ, asmā, amhe.
anya-e0801n:1680_0: Naṃsesvamussa savibhattissa asmākaṃ mamaṃ honti vā yathākkamaṃ, asmākaṃ, amhākaṃ, mamaṃ mama.
anya-e0801n:1682_0: Simhi amhassa savibhattissa ahaṃ hoti, ahaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1684_0: Aṃmhi simhi ca tumhassa savibhattissa tuvaṃtvaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, tuvaṃ, tvaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1686_0: Tumhassa tayātayīnaṃ takārassa tva hoti vā, tvayā tayā, tvayi tayi.
anya-e0801n:1688_0: Svāmhi tumhassa savibhattissa tvamhā hoti vā, pattā nissaṃ sayaṃ tvamhā, vā tveva? Tvayā.
anya-e0801n:1690_0: Paṭhame yomhi ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ntoiccādeso vā hoti,
anya-e0801n:1692_0: Naṃmhi ntantūnaṃ savibhatthīnaṃ taṃ vā hoti, gacchataṃ gacchantānaṃ, guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ.
anya-e0801n:1694_0: Sādīsu ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ totātitā honti vā yathākkamaṃ,
anya-e0801n:1696_0: Ge pare ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṭaṭāaṃ iccādesā honti,
anya-e0801n:1698_0: Yomhī dvīssa savibhattissa duvedve honti paccekaṃ, duve, dve.
anya-e0801n:1699_0: 220. Duvinnaṃ naṃmhi vā. Naṃmhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā, duvinnaṃ, dvinnaṃ.

anya-e0801n:2263_0: Ādhāratū-pamānā ācāratthe īyo yoti. Kuṭiyamivā-carati kuṭīyatī pāsāde, pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṃ bhikkhu.
anya-e0801n:2265_0: Kattutū-pamānā ācāratthe āyo hoti. Pabbato ivācarati pabbatāyati.
anya-e0801n:2269_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṃ atthe āyo hoti. Saddāyati, verāyati, kalahāyati, dhūpāyati.

anya-e0801n:2275_0: Saccādīhi dhātvatthe āpi hoti. Saccāpeti, atthāpeti, vedāpeti, sukkhāpeti, sukhāpeti, dukkhāpeti.
anya-e0801n:2277_0: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā. Kriyā attho yassa so kriyattho dhātu.
anya-e0801n:2279_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti bahulaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2281_1: tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇiṇāpī honti bahulaṃ, kāreti, kārāpeti.
anya-e0801n:2281_2: Nanu ca kattāpi karaṇādīnaṃ payojakoti taṃbyāpārepi ṇiṇāpī pāpuṇanti?
anya-e0801n:2281_3: Payojakaggahaṇasāmatthiyā na bhavissanti curādīhi visuṃ vacanasāmatthiyā ca.
anya-e0801n:2282_3: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu mānantatyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā.
anya-e0801n:2282_17: Apica ete kyādayo tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattukammabhāva vihitesu kyalādīnaṃ vidhānato tesveva viññāyantīti akammakehi dhātūhi kattubhāvesu,
anya-e0801n:2284_0: Kriyatthato aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna ntatyādīsu lo hoti. Lakāro,
anya-e0801n:2286_0: Rudhādito kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti maṃ ca antasarā paro. Makāro- nubandho,
anya-e0801n:2288_0: Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti vibhāsā, orayanto, corento,
anya-e0801n:2290_0: Divādīhi lavisaye yaka hoti. Dibbanto, dibbati.
anya-e0801n:2292_0: Tudādīhi lavisaye ko hoti. Tudamāno, tudanto, tudati.
anya-e0801n:2294_0: Jiādīhi lavisaye knā hoti. Jinanto, jināti. Kathaṃ ‘jayanto’ jayatī, ti? Bhūvādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n:2296_0: Kīādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti. Kiṇanto, kiṇāti.
anya-e0801n:2298_0: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti. Suṇamāno, suṇanto, suṇoti. Kathaṃ suṇātīti? Kyādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n:2302_0: Tabbaanīyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulaṃ bhavanti.
anya-e0801n:2304_0: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṃ. Vākyaṃ, kāriyaṃ, ceyyaṃ, jeyyaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2306_0: Ātoghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu, āssa e ca. Deyyaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2308_0: Vadādīhi kriyatthehi yo hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakammesu. Vajjaṃ, majjaṃ, gammaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2312_0: Gutādīhi kriyattehi bhāvakammesu yaka hoti. Guyhaṃ, duyhaṃ, sisso.
anya-e0801n:2312_1: Siddhā evete tabbādayo pesātisaggapattakālesupi gamyamānesu sāmaññenavidhānato,
anya-e0801n:2312_2: tvayā khalu kaṭo kattabbo, karaṇīyo, kāriyo, kicco,
anya-e0801n:2312_6: Evaṃ uddhamohuttikepi vattamānato pesādīsu siddhā eva.
anya-e0801n:2312_7: Tathā arahe kattari sattivisiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne āvassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe ca bhāvādo siddhā,
anya-e0801n:2314_0: Kattari kārake kriyatthā ltuṇakā honti bahulaṃ. Paṭhitā, pāṭhako.
anya-e0801n:2318_0: Āsiṃsāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ kriyatthā ako hoti kattari.
anya-e0801n:2320_0: Karato kattari ṇano hoti. Karotīti kāraṇaṃ, kattarīti kiṃ? Karaṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2322_0: Hāto vīhismiṃ kāle ca ṇano hoti kattari.
anya-e0801n:2324_0: Vidasmā kū hoti kattari. Vidū, lokavidū.
anya-e0801n:2326_0: Vipubbā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari. Viññū. Vitoti kiṃ? Paññā.
anya-e0801n:2328_0: Kammato parā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari. Sabbaññū, kālaññū.
anya-e0801n:2330_0: Kammato parā kriyatthā kvaci aṇa hoti kattari.
anya-e0801n:2330_3: bahulādhikārā idha na hoti ādiccaṃ passati,
anya-e0801n:2332_0: Kammato parā gamā rū hoti kattari. Vedagū pāragū.
anya-e0801n:2333_0: 43. Samānañña bhavanta yāditū-pamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā.
anya-e0801n:2334_0: Samānādīhi yādīhi copamānehi parā disā kammakārake rīrikkhakā honti.
anya-e0801n:2334_1: Samāno viya dissatīti sadī sadikkho sadiso.
anya-e0801n:2336_0: Bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā a ghaṇa gha kā honti bahulaṃ. A- paggaho, niggaho, karo, garo, cayo, jayo, ravo, bhavo, paco, vaco, annado,
anya-e0801n:2336_10: lābho laddho, gha- vako, nipako, ka- piyo, khipo, bhujo, āyudhaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2338_0: Dādhāhi bahulami hoti bhāvakārakesu. Ādi, nidhi, vālami.
anya-e0801n:2340_0: Vamādīhi bhāvakārakesvathu hoti. Vamathu, vepathu, (avathu, sayathu).
anya-e0801n:2344_2: adhikaraṇaṃ, calano, jalano, kodhano, kopano, maṇḍano, bhūsano.
anya-e0801n:2345_0: 49. Itthiyamaṇa tti ka yaka yā ca.
anya-e0801n:2346_0: Itthiliṅge bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aādayo honti ano ca bahulaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2346_2: puttiyā īhā bhikkhā, āpadā, medhā, godhā, ṇakārā, hārā, tārā, dhārā, ārā, kti- iṭṭhi, siṭṭhi, bhitti, bhatti,
anya-e0801n:2346_3: tanti bhūti, ka- guhā, rujā, mudā, yaka- vijjā, ijjā, ya- seyyā, samajjā, pabbajjā,
anya-e0801n:2350_0: Karato ririyo hotitthiyaṃ. Karaṇaṃ kiriyā. Kathaṃ ‘kriyā’ti? “Kriyāyaṃ”ti nipātanā.
anya-e0801n:2352_1: bhidheyye kriyatthā pare ikitī honti, vaci, yudhi, pacati,
anya-e0801n:2354_0: Kriyatthā ṇī hoti sīlādīsu patīyamānesu, uṇhabhojī, khīrapāyī, avassakārī, satandāyī.
anya-e0801n:2358_1: tthe vattamānato kriyatthā ktavantuttāvī honti kattari. Vijitavā, vijitāvī,
anya-e0801n:2360_0: Bhāve kamme ca bhūte kto hoti. Āsitaṃ bhavatā. Kato kaṭo bhavatā.
anya-e0801n:2363_0: 58. Ṭhā-sa vasa silisa sī ruha jara janīhi.
anya-e0801n:2366_0: Gamanatthato akammakato ca kriyatthā ādhāre kto hoti kattari ca yathāpattañca,
anya-e0801n:2366_8: ‘devo ce vuṭṭho sampannā sālayo’ti kāraṇasāmaggīsampatti etthābhimatā.
anya-e0801n:2368_15: evaṃ sīlito, rakkhito, khanto, ākuṭṭho, ruṭṭho, rusito,
anya-e0801n:2368_16: abhibyāhaṭo, dayiyo, haṭṭho, kantā, saṃyato, amato,
anya-e0801n:2369_0: 61. Tuṃ tāye tave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṃ tadatthāya.
anya-e0801n:2370_0: Bhavissati atthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve tuṃ tāye tave honti kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ patīyamānāyaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2370_4: icchati bhottuṃ kāmeti bhottunti imīnāva siddhaṃ,
anya-e0801n:2372_0: Alaṃ khalusaddānaṃ paṭisedhatthānaṃ payoge tunādayo vā honti bhāve.
anya-e0801n:2374_8: ‘Appatvā nadiṃ pabbato atikkamma pabbataṃ nadī’ti bhūdhātussa sabbattha sambhavā ekakattukatā pubbakālatā ca gamyate.
anya-e0801n:2374_9: ‘Bhutvā bhutvā gacchatīti’ imināva siddhaṃ ābhikkhaññantu dvibbacanāvagamyate.
anya-e0801n:2376_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyattā nto ho ti kattari, tiṭṭhanto.
anya-e0801n:2378_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā māno hoti, kattari. Tiṭṭhamāno.
anya-e0801n:2380_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriṃyatthā bhāve kammeca māno hoti. Ṭhīyamānaṃ, paccamāno odano.
anya-e0801n:2382_0: Anāgatatthe vattamānato kriyatthā tentamānā ssapubbā honti.
anya-e0801n:2384_0: Kriyatthā pare bahulaṃ ṇvādayo honti. Cāru, dāru.
anya-e0801n:2386_0: Khachasappaccayantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ paṭhamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati. Titikkhā, jigucchā, vīmaṃsā.
anya-e0801n:2388_0: Parokkhāyaṃ paṭhamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati. Jagāma,
anya-e0801n:2390_0: Ādibhūtā sarā paramekassaraṃ dve hoti, asisisati, ādismāti kiṃ? Jajagāra, sarāti kiṃ? Papāca.
anya-e0801n:2392_0: Yaṃ dvibhūtaṃ, na taṃ puna dvittamāpajjate, titikkhisati, jigucchisati.
anya-e0801n:2396_0: Dvitte pubbassa saro rasso hoti. Dadāti.
anya-e0801n:2398_0: Dvitte pubbassādito-ññassa byañjanassa lopo hoti. Asisisati.
anya-e0801n:2400_0: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti khachasesu. Pipāsati,
anya-e0801n:2402_0: Dvitte pubbassa gupissa ussa i hoti khachasesu, jigucchati.
anya-e0801n:2404_0: Dvitte pubesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā honti. Bubhukkhati, ciccheda.
anya-e0801n:2406_0: Dvitte pubbesaṃ kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā honti yathākkamaṃ. Cukopa, jahāti.
anya-e0801n:2408_0: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti parassa ca maṃ, vīmaṃsati.
anya-e0801n:2410_1: ññasmiṃ vattamānassa dvitte pubbassa kitassa vā ti hoti.
anya-e0801n:2412_0: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ eohonti yathākkamaṃ paccaye. Cetabbaṃ, netabbaṃ, sotabbaṃ,
anya-e0801n:2414_0: Lahubhūtassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa eo honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2416_0: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa ā hoti. Kārako.
anya-e0801n:2418_0: Te eoā kānubandhe nāgame ca na honti. Cito, suto, diṭṭho, puṭṭho,
anya-e0801n:2418_14: pīnayituṃ, pīnanaṃ, pīnituṃ, pīnayati, sunoti, sinoti, dunoti, hinoti,
anya-e0801n:2420_0: Te kvaci vā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu. Mudito, ruditaṃ, roditaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2422_0: Kānubandhanāgamato-ññasmimpi te kvaci, nu honti. Khipako, panūdanaṃ, vadhako.
anya-e0801n:2426_0: Sare pare eonaṃ ayaavā honti. Jayo, bhavo, sarati kiṃ? Jeti, anubhoti.
anya-e0801n:2428_0: Eonaṃ āyāvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe. Nāyayati, bhāvayati, ‘sayāpetvā’tiādīsu rassattaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2434_0: Rudhādīnaṃ kvaci maṃ vā hoti. Rundhituṃ, rujjhituṃ, kvacitveva? Nirodho.
anya-e0801n:2436_0: Antabyañjanassa lopo hoti kvimhi. Bhattaṃ gasanti gaṇhanti vā etthāti bhattaggaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2440_0: Makāranakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ niggahītaṃ hoti ayakāre byañjane.
anya-e0801n:2442_0: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūmi, byañjanetveva? Abravi.
anya-e0801n:2444_0: Ghānubandhe cakārajakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ kagā honti yathākkamaṃ. Vākyaṃ, bhāgyaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2448_0: Payyādīhi parassa hanassa gho hoti kvimhi. Paligho, paṭigho, aghaṃ rassattaṃ nipātanā, saṅgho, ogho.
anya-e0801n:2450_0: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṃ hoti se. Jighaṃsā.
anya-e0801n:2452_0: Dvitte paresaṃ jitarānaṃ gī hoti se. Vijigīsā, jigīsā.
anya-e0801n:2454_0: Dvitte parassa dhāssa ha hoti. Dahati.
anya-e0801n:2456_0: Dusassa dīgho hoti ṇimhi. Dusito. Ṇimhīti kiṃ? Duṭṭho.
anya-e0801n:2458_0: Guhissa dīgho hoti sare. Nigūhanaṃ sareti kiṃ? Guyhaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2460_0: Muhabahānaṃ guhissa ca dīgho hoti takārādo kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite, mūḷho, bāḷho, gūḷho, teti kiṃ? Muyhati,
anya-e0801n:2462_0: Vahassa ussa dīgho hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Vuṭṭho.
anya-e0801n:2464_0: Dhā=dhāraṇetīmassa hi hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Nihito, nihitavā.
anya-e0801n:2466_0: Gamādīnaṃ rakārantānaṃ ca antassa lopo hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Gato, khato, hato, mato, tato, saññato, rato, kato, tetveva? Gamyate,
anya-e0801n:2468_0: Vacādīnaṃ vassa vā uṭa hoti kānubandhe- tve. Uttaṃ, vuttaṃ, uṭṭhaṃ, vuṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0801n:2470_0: Vacādīnamassa u hoti kānubandhe-sve. Vuttaṃ, vuṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2472_0: Vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kānubandhe tve. Vuddho. Vaddho.
anya-e0801n:2474_0: Yajassa yassa ṭiyī honti kānubandhe-tve. Iṭṭhaṃ, yiṭṭhaṃ, atvetveva? Yajitvāna, yajitvā.
anya-e0801n:2476_0: Ṭhāssi hoti kānubandhe-tve. Ṭhito, atvetveva? Ṭhatvāna, ṭhatvā.
anya-e0801n:2478_0: Gāpānamī hoti kānabandhe- tve. Gītaṃ, pītaṃ,
anya-e0801n:2480_0: Janissa ā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Jāto. Atvetveva? Janitvā.
anya-e0801n:2482_0: Sāsassa sisa vā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Siṭṭhaṃ, satthaṃ, sisso, sāsiyo atvetveva? Anusāsitvāna.
anya-e0801n:2486_0: Tumādīsu vā karassā hoti. Kātuṃ kattuṃ, kātuna kattuna, kātabbaṃ kattabbaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2488_0: Ñādhātussa jā hoti nakāre. Jānituṃ, jānanto, neti kiṃ? Ñāto.
anya-e0801n:2490_3: sakkuṇoti, pāpuṇoti, ṇeti kiṃ? Sakkoti, pāpeti.
anya-e0801n:2492_0: Nismā parassa cissa cho hoti. Nicchayo.
anya-e0801n:2494_0: Jarasadānamantasarā paro īma hoti vibhāsā. Jīraṇaṃ, jīrati, jīrāpeti,
anya-e0801n:2494_3: nisīdituṃ, nisīdati, vāti kiṃ? Jarā, nisajjā,
anya-e0801n:2495_0: 124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhā.
anya-e0801n:2496_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Daṭṭhā, daṭṭhuṃ, duddaso, addasa, addā, addaṃ, addakkhi,
anya-e0801n:2498_0: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīvikkhakesu. Sarī, sadī, sarikkho, sadikkho, sariso, sadiso.
anya-e0801n:2500_0: Dahassa dassa ḍo hoti vā. Ḍāho, dāho, ḍahati, dahati.
anya-e0801n:2502_0: Āparīhi parassa dahassa dassa ḷo hoti anaghaṇasu. Āḷahanaṃ, pariḷāho.
anya-e0801n:2504_3: etena katthaci kassaci dhātussa appayogāpi ñāpito hoti.
anya-e0801n:2506_0: Aādo, āādo, ssādo ca atthissa bhū hoti. Babhūva, abhavā, abhavissā, bhavissati.
anya-e0801n:2507_2: Ntādisūtthissādilopo hoti. Santo, samāno, santi, santu, siyā, siyuṃ,
anya-e0801n:2509_0: Pādīhi kiriyāvisesajotakehi saddehi parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho vā hoti.
anya-e0801n:2509_4: Pa parā apa saṃ anu ava o ni du vi adhi api atisu u abhi pati pari upa ā pādī.
anya-e0801n:2511_0: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅa hoti kvaci. Anādiyitvā, samādiyati, kvacitveva? Ādāya.
anya-e0801n:2513_0: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti. Saṅkhāro,
anya-e0801n:2513_2: karassāti avatvā karotissāti vacanaṃ timhi ca vikaraṇuppattiñāpetuṃ.
anya-e0801n:2515_0: Purā iccasmā nipātā parassa karassa kha hoti. Purakkhatvā, purekkhāro-ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n:2517_0: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti, nikkhamati, kvacitveva? Nikkamo.
anya-e0801n:2519_0: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇattānaṃ kriyatthānamiyaṅuvaṅa hoti sare kvaci. Vediyati, bruvanti,
anya-e0801n:2521_0: Ñādito-ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye. Dīyati, aññādissāti kiṃ? Ñāyati, tāyatiṃ.
anya-e0801n:2523_0: Tanassa ā hoti vā kye. Tāyate, taññate.
anya-e0801n:2525_0: Sarantassa kriyatthassa dīgho hoti kye, cīyate, sūyate.
anya-e0801n:2527_1: nantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Tuṭṭho, tuṭṭhavā,
anya-e0801n:2529_0: Kasasmā parassānantarassa tassa ṭha hoti kasassa vā ima ca. Kiṭṭhaṃ, kaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0801n:2533_0: Pucchādīhi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Puṭṭho, bhaṭṭho, yiṭṭho,
anya-e0801n:2535_0: Etehi parassānantarassa tassa tha hoti, satthaṃ, vatthaṃ,
anya-e0801n:2537_0: Dhakārahakārabhakārantehi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa tassa dha hoti. Vuddho, duddhaṃ, laddhaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2539_0: Dahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍha hoti. Daḍḍho.
anya-e0801n:2541_0: Bahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍho hoti, bahassuma ca ḍhasanniyogena. Buḍḍho.
anya-e0801n:2543_0: Rahādīhi parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti ḷo cāntassa. Āruḷho, gūḷho, vūḷho, bāḷho, (ogāḷho),
anya-e0801n:2545_0: Muhā parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti vā ḷo cāntassa hasanniyogena. Mūḷho, muddho.
anya-e0801n:2547_0: Bhidādito paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa no hoti.
anya-e0801n:2547_13: ktaktavantūnanti kiṃ? Bhitti, chitti, bhettuṃ, chettuṃ.
anya-e0801n:2549_0: Dāto paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa inno hoti. Dinno, dinnavā.
anya-e0801n:2551_0: Kirādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassānantarassa ṇa hoti,
anya-e0801n:2553_0: Tarādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa riṇṇo hoti. Tiṇṇo tiṇṇavā, jiṇṇo jiṇṇavā, ciṇṇo ciṇṇavā.
anya-e0801n:2555_0: Bhanjādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassānantarassa ga hoti.
anya-e0801n:2557_0: Susā paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa kho hoti. Sukkho sukkhavā.
anya-e0801n:2559_0: Pacā paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa ko hoti. Pakko pakkavā.
anya-e0801n:2561_0: Mucā paresaṃ ktaktavantūnaṃ tassa ko vā hoti.
anya-e0801n:2563_0: Vaḍḍhā parassa ktissa tassa lopo hoti. Vaḍḍhi.
anya-e0801n:2565_0: Kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopo hoti, abhibhū.
anya-e0801n:2567_0: Ṇiṇāpīnaṃ lopo hoti tesu ṇiṇāpīsu. Kārentaṃ payojayati kāreti kārāpayati.
anya-e0801n:2569_0: Vikaraṇānaṃ kvaci lopo hoti. Udapādi, hanti.
anya-e0801n:2571_0: Kriyatthā parassa mānassa makārassa lopo hoti kvaci. Karāṇo, kvacīti kiṃ? Kurumāno.
anya-e0801n:2573_0: Ñilāname hoti kvaci. Gahetvā, adenti, kvacitveva? Vapitvā.
anya-e0801n:2577_0: Ktvāssa vā tuṃyānā honti samāse kvacci.
anya-e0801n:2579_0: Hanasmā parassa ktvāssa racco vā hoti samāse. Āhacca, āhanitvā.
anya-e0801n:2581_0: Sāsādhīhi parā karā parassa ktvassa cacariccā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2583_0: Iiccasmā parassa ktvāssa cco vā hoti. Adhicca adhīyitvā, samecca sametvā.
anya-e0801n:2585_0: Disato ktvāssa vānavā honti vā disassa ca sa kāro taṃsanniyogena.
anya-e0801n:2587_0: Kriyatthā parassa byañjanādippaccayassa ñi vā hoti. Bhuñjituṃ bhottuṃ, byañjanassāti kiṃ? Pācako.
anya-e0801n:2589_0: Rantato kriyatthā parassa paccayanakārassa ṇo hoti. Araṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ.
anya-e0801n:2591_0: Rantato paresaṃ ntamānatyādīnaṃ nassa ṇo na hoti, karonto, kurumāno, karonti.
anya-e0801n:2593_3: icchanto icchamāno icchati acchanto acchamāno acchati,
anya-e0801n:2597_2: tiṭṭhamāno, tiṭṭhati, pivanto, pivamāno, pivati, vātvevi? Ṭhāti, pāti.

anya-e0801n:2654_0: Īādīsu vacassa oma hoti. Makāro-nubandho, avoca, īādoti kiṃ? Avacā.
anya-e0801n:2656_0: Advite vattamānassa dāssa daṃ vā hoti mimesu. Dammi demi, damma dema, advitteti kiṃ? Dadādhi dadāma.

anya-e0801n:2660_0: Karassa saokārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu. Akāsi akari, akaṃsu akariṃsu, akā akarā.

anya-e0801n:3226_0: 225. Khī mi pī cu mā vākāhi ḷo ussa vā dīgho ca.
anya-e0801n:3227_0: Khī- khaye, mi- pakkhepe, pī- tappane, cu- cavane, mā- māne, vī vā- gamane, kā gā- sadde,
anya-e0801n:3229_0: Gu-saddetīmasmā ḷaka hoti ḷo ca. Gavati pavattati etenāti guḷo=ucchuvikāro. Goḷo=lakuṇḍako.
anya-e0801n:3231_7: kukyati pāpakārīhi ādīyatīti kukkuḷaṃ=saṅku saṃkiṇṇo sobbho.
anya-e0801n:3233_0: Pātismā ḷi hoti. Atthaṃ pāti rakkhatīti pāḷi=tanti.
anya-e0801n:3235_0: Vītismā ḷu hoti. Veti pavattatīti veḷu=veṇu.
